english.segment1: Amazing grace, how sweet the sound. That saved a wretch like me. I once was lost but now I'm found. Was blind but now I see so clearly
english.segment2: Chorus: Hallelujah, grace like rain falls down on me. Hallelujah, all my stains are washed away, washed away
english.segment3: 'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear. And grace my fears relieved. How precious did that grace appear. The hour I first believed
english.segment5: When we've been there ten thousand years. Bright shining as the sun. We've no less days to sing Your praise. Than when we first begun
